title: In the Heart of the 1080p BluRay Remux AVC TrueHD Atmos 7.1 DUAL
description:
In the winter of 1820, the whaleboat of New England Essex was attacked by something that no one could believe: a whale of tremendous size and determination, and a sense of almost human vengeance. The maritime disaster that occurred in real life inspire Melville to write Moby-Dick. However, the book told only half the story. Heart of the Sea reveals the dire consequences of the meeting, as the surviving crew of the boat is taken to its limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Facing storms, hunger, panic and despair, the men will be led to question their deepest beliefs, the value of their lives to the morality of their activity, while its captain seeks guidance on the open sea and his first sergeant major still tries to defeat the great whale.
